message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $115. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. I'm willing to pay a fair price, but I want to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
I understand your position, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $110? It's a competitive price for such a valuable product.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. How about we try $108? I'm willing to compromise, but I want to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
